Package com.eclipsesource.tabris.widgets

Class PdfView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • com.eclipsesource.tabris.widgets.PdfView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.eclipse.rap.rwt.Adaptable, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SerializableCompatibility
    public class PdfView
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite

    A widget to display a PDF document.

    The PdfView is a stand alone Widget. It needs to be part of your layout.

    Since:
    3.17
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setPageElevation

        public void setPageElevation​(int pageElevation)
        Setting this property determines the intensity of the shadow page on the widget background. On iOS the shadow is either visible or not (property set to 0), but always looks the same.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT - if the page elevation is negative
        org.eclipse.swt.SWTException -
        • ERROR_WIDGET_DISPOSED - if the receiver has been disposed
        • ERROR_THREAD_INVALID_ACCESS - if not called from the thread that created the receiver

      • setSpacing

        public void setSpacing​(int spacing)
        Sets vertical spacing between the individual pages. The default is specific to the device and can not be changed on iOS.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT - if the vertical spacing is zero or negative
        org.eclipse.swt.SWTException -
        • ERROR_WIDGET_DISPOSED - if the receiver has been disposed
        • ERROR_THREAD_INVALID_ACCESS - if not called from the thread that created the receiver

      • setZoomEnabled

        public void setZoomEnabled​(boolean zoomEnabled)
        Enables the pinch-to-zoom gesture. On iOS this will scale the entire document, while on Android each page is scaled individually.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.swt.SWTException -
        • ERROR_WIDGET_DISPOSED - if the receiver has been disposed
        • ERROR_THREAD_INVALID_ACCESS - if not called from the thread that created the receiver

      • getZoomEnabled

        public boolean getZoomEnabled()
        Returns true if image zoom is enabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if image zoom is enabled
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.swt.SWTException -
        • ERROR_WIDGET_DISPOSED - if the receiver has been disposed
        • ERROR_THREAD_INVALID_ACCESS - if not called from the thread that created the receiver
